description_bullets: Developed a scalable real-time stock market analytics platform using React, Flask, and PostgreSQL with AWS deployment.
Integrated multiple financial APIs and WebSocket streams to provide live market updates with sub-second latency.
Implemented dynamic chart visualizations and collaborative watchlists, increasing user engagement by 200+ daily users.
Optimized backend performance through asynchronous processing and query caching, reducing load time by 40%.
Implemented a B-Tree–based file management system in C++ for efficient storage and retrieval of musical instrument records.
Designed dynamic indexing mechanisms and delimiter-based record organization to minimize access time.
Enabled CRUD operations with variable-length fields and primary key indexing for faster lookup and modification.
Validated the system through extensive unit and integration testing ensuring correctness and efficiency.
Built an automated course scheduling and optimization tool using Python, Pandas, and SQLite.
Implemented constraint satisfaction algorithms (backtracking and greedy heuristics) for conflict-free academic scheduling.
Developed a Streamlit-based web interface for interactive student input and visualization of optimal semester plans.
Reduced manual scheduling errors by 95% and improved student planning efficiency across 500+ users.
Developed a Machine Learning–based Intrusion Detection System using Python, Scikit-learn, and Pandas.
Trained and optimized a Random Forest classifier achieving 98.5% accuracy on network intrusion datasets.
Performed advanced feature engineering to reduce false positives by 20% and enhance real-time detection speed.
Delivered a lightweight IDS prototype deployable in real-time security monitoring pipelines.
Built a responsive web platform for real-time financial analytics using React (frontend), Flask (backend), and PostgreSQL (database).
Integrated multiple market APIs and enabled live chart updates with less than 1-second refresh latency.
Implemented user authentication and collaborative watchlists for shared data tracking.
Deployed on AWS EC2 with load balancing, achieving 99.9% uptime and 200+ daily active users.

top_projects.project_name: Music Instrument Management System Using B-Tree Indexing
description_bullets: Designed a file-based management system using B-Tree indexing for efficient data retrieval and modification.
Implemented CRUD operations and primary indexing in C++ for optimized search and record updates.
Utilized delimiter-based variable-length records for improved memory management.
Conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure robust and efficient file operations.
Developed an AI-based course scheduling system leveraging Python, SQLite, and Streamlit for student academic planning.
Implemented constraint satisfaction and optimization algorithms to resolve course conflicts efficiently.
Provided personalized, semester-by-semester plans improving planning accuracy by 95%.
Enhanced usability through an intuitive web interface enabling instant schedule visualization.

top_projects.project_name: Machine Learning-Based Network Intrusion Detection System (IDS)
description_bullets: Developed a supervised ML-based intrusion detection model using Scikit-learn and Pandas for network security monitoring.
Trained models on benchmark datasets (e.g., NSL-KDD) to classify attack types with 98.5% accuracy.
Optimized feature selection to reduce false positives by 20% and improve inference speed.
Deployed the system as a real-time IDS pipeline capable of live network traffic monitoring.
